db:section.db:title: bool qFuzzyCompare(const QVector4D &v1, const QVector4D &v2)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if v1 and v2 are equal, allowing for a small fuzziness factor for floating-point comparisons; false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: bool operator!=(const QVector4D &v1, const QVector4D &v2)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if v1 is not equal to v2; otherwise returns false. This operator uses an exact floating-point comparison.

db:section.db:title: const QVector4D operator*(const QVector4D &v1, const QVector4D &v2)
db:section.db:para: Returns the vector consisting of the multiplication of the components from v1 and v2.

db:section.db:title: const QVector4D operator*(const QVector4D &vector, float factor)
db:section.db:para: Returns a copy of the given vector, multiplied by the given factor.

db:section.db:title: const QVector4D operator*(float factor, const QVector4D &vector)
db:section.db:para: Returns a copy of the given vector, multiplied by the given factor.

db:section.db:title: const QVector4D operator+(const QVector4D &v1, const QVector4D &v2)
db:section.db:para: Returns a QVector4D object that is the sum of the given vectors, v1 and v2; each component is added separately.

db:section.db:title: const QVector4D operator-(const QVector4D &vector)
db:section.db:para: Returns a QVector4D object that is formed by changing the sign of all three components of the given vector.

db:section.db:title: const QVector4D operator-(const QVector4D &v1, const QVector4D &v2)
db:section.db:para: Returns a QVector4D object that is formed by subtracting v2 from v1; each component is subtracted separately.

db:section.db:title: const QVector4D operator/(const QVector4D &vector, float divisor)
db:section.db:para: Returns the QVector4D object formed by dividing all four components of the given vector by the given divisor.

db:section.db:title: bool operator==(const QVector4D &v1, const QVector4D &v2)
db:section.db:para: Returns true if v1 is equal to v2; otherwise returns false. This operator uses an exact floating-point comparison.
